title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 781.3 - Identification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 781.3 - Identification

State Regulations

All equipment operated pursuant to this Part, except
equipment operated in a bus line operation shall have affixed thereto the full
name and USDOT number when applicable of the authorized carrier in the same
manner as if the equipment were owned by the authorized
carrier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
781.3

Adopted

New

York State Register October 5, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 40, eff. 10/5/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
